name: Google Calendar Create Event
description: Creates a new event in a specified calendar.

inputs.name: endpoint
inputs.description: The Google Calendar API endpoint to call

inputs.name: calendarId
inputs.description: Calendar identifier. To retrieve calendar IDs call the calendarList.list method

inputs.name: startDateTime
inputs.description: Start time of the event (RFC3339 timestamp, e.g., '2025-05-01T10:00:00-07:00')

inputs.name: endDateTime
inputs.description: End time of the event (RFC3339 timestamp, e.g., '2025-05-01T11:00:00-07:00')

inputs.name: location
inputs.description: Geographic location of the event as free-form text

inputs.name: attendees
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of attendee email addresses

inputs.name: colorId
inputs.description: The color of the event. The number corresponds to the colors defined for the user's calendar

inputs.name: sendUpdates
inputs.description: Whether to send notifications about the creation of the event (none, all, externalOnly)

inputs.name: transparency
inputs.description: Whether the event blocks time on the calendar (opaque, transparent)

inputs.name: visibility
inputs.description: Visibility of the event (default, public, private, confidential)

inputs.name: reminders
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of reminders in minutes before the event (e.g., '10,30,60')
